pages.text: In order to incubate gems, first you must craft an Incubator. View the next page to find the recipe for the Incubator.

Now, place down your Incubator where ever you would like it, then you can open the Incubator GUI by right-clicking the block. $(br)In order to create gems you need Gem Essence, Chroma, an inactive Gem base of your choosing, and the cruxes required to grow that gem. $(br)Each gem has a page in the guidebook that describes what its requirements are, including cruxes and Gem Essence colors.
You may also supplement the Incubator with Primer items, such as a Prime Booster or a Speed Booster.
